instruction: Create a GUI program in Python that takes three inputs and displays an output.
buggy_code:
import tkinter
window = tkinter.Tk()
window.configure(background='light green')
window.title('Calculator')
window.geometry('270x150')
label_num1 = tkinter.Label(window, text='Input #1', bg='light green')
label_num1.grid(row=1, column=0)
label_num2 = tkinter.Label(window, text='Input #2', bg='light green')
label_num2.grid(row=2, column=0)
label_num3 = tkinter.Label(window, text='Input #3', bg='light green')
label_num3.grid(row=3, column=0)
num1 = tkinter.Entry(window)
num1.grid(row=1, column=1)
num2 = tkinter.Entry(window)
num2.grid(row=2, column=1)
num3 = tkinter.Entry(window)
num3.grid(row=3, column=1)
btn_result = tkinter.Button(window, text='Submit', fg='Black', bg='light blue', command=MyFun)
btn_result.grid(row=4, column=1)
btn_exit = tkinter.Button(window, text='Exit', fg='Black', bg='light blue', command=exit)
btn_exit.grid(row=4, column=2)

def MyFun():
    a = int(num1.get())
    b = int(num2.get())
    c = int(num3.get())
    result = a + b - c
    label_result = tkinter.Label(window, text='Sum: ' + str(result), fg='Black', bg='light green')
    label_result.grid(row=5, column=1)
window.mainloop()
